entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:08 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 8:08 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
